relation: Avoid anything between airports and hotels. Airports means Katunayake and Ratmalana.
Avoid Nelum Pokuna (Town Hall) and BMICH
pageTitle: CHOGM 2013 Traffic Plan For Colombo (With Map) · YAMU
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {53410=rohana 1965. It's a great event for us.thanks…, 45487=When will they leave country? Roads will be closed after 17th as well. May be few days more in random times.}
textBeforeTable: Stay in your home or leave Colombo. Executive Summary On Friday, the VIPs will go to Nelum Pokuna, making Town Hall inaccessible for the rest of Colombo. GIF For Friday November 15th SueKiri) and drawn it on a map and written it out in a table. The parts marked dark red are officially going to be closed or blocked at random times. The parts in light red are connecting roads we assume will be bad as well. text traffic plan (thanks The dreaded CHOGM is almost upon us. Every two years this meeting of heads of state and their entourages snarls traffic in some host country, and this year its us. What we've done is taken this indi on 24 October 2013 Posted by CHOGM 2013 Traffic Plan For Colombo (With Map)
textAfterTable: Full Detail We've translated this directly from the Police press release. Please excuse small typos and spelling differences. This is the somewhat exact closure times and what roads/junctions will be closed.
